mapper.insert: insert into IF_WCS_01 (OWNRKY, SKUKEY, DESC01, DESC02, BARCOD, WEIGHT, LENGTH, WIDTHW, HEIGHT, BXIPSU, PLIPSU, CREDATE, CREUSR, REMARKS) values (#{ownrky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skukey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barcod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{length,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{widthw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{height,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bxipsu,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{plipsu,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{credate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creusr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
